LanguageData.Cassandra.label: Cassandra Classic
LanguageData.Cassandra.description: Cassandra creates story events on a classic increasing curve of challenge and tension. She'll push you with dangerous events, then give breathing room, then come back to push once more.
LanguageData.Phoebe.label: Phoebe Chillax
LanguageData.Phoebe.description: Phoebe gives lots of time between disasters to build your colony. But beware - at high difficulties, she'll hit as hard as anyone.
LanguageData.Randy.label: Randy Random
LanguageData.Randy.description: Randy doesn't follow rules. He'll generate random events, and he doesn't care if they make a story of triumph or utter hopelessness. It's all drama to him.\n\nWarning: Since Randy is truly random, he will sometimes send extremely difficult or unfair groups of events at you. It makes for high drama - and unavoidable sacrifices.
LanguageData.Kara.label: Kara Fateful
LanguageData.Kara.description: We all go a little crazy, do not we? Kara will play with you as long as it takes to see your exhausted body trembling with anger and frustration.
LanguageData.Rey.label: Rey Torturer
LanguageData.Rey.description: Rey is a tough and consistent torturer. She will taunt you until magma flows out of your ass.
LanguageData.PrototypePZ.label: Zero Prototype
LanguageData.PrototypePZ.description: He will tell you the story of despair and hopelessness.
